title: Natural Language Processing with TensorFlow 2 - Beginner's Course
excerpt: This course is a practical introduction to natural language processing with TensorFlow 2.0. In this tutorial you will go from having zero knowledge to writing an artificial intelligence that can compose Shakespearean prose.  No prior experience with deep learning is required, though it is always helpful
